scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.setup:dev: npm run docker:up && npm run install:all && npm run build:shared && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
